================================

### Title
Meningococcal C and Quadrivalent Vaccines

### Reference Number
WS3764597399-Doc3768664810

### Solicitation Number
WS3764597399

### Publication Date
2022-11-29

### Tender Closing Date
2022-12-20 14:00:00

### Expected Contract Start Date
2023-04-01

### Expected Contract End Date
None (extendable for up to two years)

### Tender Status
Expired

### UNSPSC Code
51000000 - _Drugs and Pharmaceutical Products_

### Procurement Category
Goods and Services (GD)

### Notice Type
Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding

### Selection Criteria
Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Regions of Delivery
Canada

### Tender Description

#### Purpose

The Federal, Provincial, and Territorial (FTP) Bulk Purchasing Group is seeking bidders for meningococcal C and quadrivalent vaccines. Bidders must meet the mandatory requirements detailed in the Request for Proposal (RFP).

#### Contract Period

The contract period is from April 1, 2023, to March 31, 2024. An option for extension of the contract for up to two additional one-year periods under the same terms and conditions is available.

#### Tender Submission Requirements

Please note that the tender closing date has been amended to December 20, 2022, 14:00:00. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by this time. Late bids will be considered non-responsive.

### Contact Information

If you require further information or clarification on this tender, please contact:

Eady, Kasandra (SPAC/PSP
